author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE MOTION BECOMING ERATIC AS IT BEGINS TO TURN TO THE NORTHWEST  AND STRENGTHEN TONIGHT AND SATURDAY...
summary:
...HONE MOTION BECOMING ERATIC AS IT BEGINS TO TURN TO THE NORTHWEST  AND STRENGTHEN TONIGHT AND SATURDAY...
 As of 8:00 PM HST Fri Aug 30
 the center of Hone was located near 22.2, -175.6
 with movement WNW at 6 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Hone (CP1/CP012024)
